entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:46 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High 13 except 8 near the lake.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 13 except 8 near the lake. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:46 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
